title: Understanding ASD
text: ASD stands for Autism Spectrum Disorder. It is a condition that affects how a person thinks, interacts, and experiences the world.

title: Types of Disorders
text: Disorders can be categorized into various types such as neuro-developmental, social, attention span, and philosophical. Each type affects individuals differently.

title: Identifying the Type of Disorder
text: Consider the characteristics of ASD. It primarily affects brain development and functioning.
